about_the_game:
Adrian Heart is a genius composer, also a secret one.

Not a soul save for his sister and her husband know the identity of the mysterious composer behind one of the worlds most beloved pop princesses.

Unfortunately for him, his anonymity is about to work against him when said sister asks him to assist at their families talent agency.

Heart Agency, the worlds leading talent agency, home to some of the most elite popular talent, now with a new manager!

Whoops!

Adrian must now navigate keeping his identity secret while leading a new new life alongside his famous charges.

With a model, an actor, and an idol, he's got his work cut out for him.

Join Adrian in this BL Visual Novel as he gets to know his new charges, and maybe even falls in love.

Features

  • Three romanceable love interests
  • Stunning illustrations by 6nii9
  • Original Soundtrack

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Heart Agency

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Adrian Heart is a reclusive composer dragged into the world of the entertainment industry by his famous sister to become the new personal assistant to one of the elite talents who calls the agency home. He is none to happy about it.
